name: Ultra Pro Pokemon X and Y 2" 3-Ring Binder

reviews.name: Ultra Pro Pokemon X and Y 2" 3-Ring Binder
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to find a Pok√©mon storage binder. There's really nothing to store and protect the hundreds of cards my boys have. I thought this would keep them organized and protected. When I opened it there's nothing inside it. So you have to purchase the inserts for the cards. I would think a $12 binder would at least come with some. This was a disappointing buy.
reviews.title: Empty Binder? What good is that

reviews.name: Ultra Pro Pokemon X and Y 2" 3-Ring Binder
reviews.reviewText: I failed to read the fine print and thought the card sleeve pages were included. Its an overpriced binder and I had wished my nephew could have designed the outside cover with a plain white binder. Since he requested this binder specifically then I kept it. I had to go to Walmart to buy the sleeves and spent another 6 dollars.
reviews.title: disappointed

reviews.name: Ultra Pro Pokemon X and Y 2" 3-Ring Binder
reviews.reviewText: Great book to hold the Pokeman cards. Need to purchase the plastic holders as this is only the notebook.
reviews.title: Pokeman binder

reviews.name: Ultra Pro Pokemon X and Y 2" 3-Ring Binder
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son. He loving. Not included the sheet. Bought in here the package only for $3.
reviews.title: Good product

reviews.name: Ultra Pro Pokemon X and Y 2" 3-Ring Binder
reviews.reviewText:
The items arrived quickly and packaged carefully. They are exactly as described and ordered. I am assuming they will please my nine year Pokemon crazy grandson but will know after Christmas.
Thanks for speedy shipment.
reviews.title: Happy grandson.
